p: To evaluate the effects of herbivory on the A. philoxeroides populations, we used paired t-tests to analyze the differences in shoot number, total shoot length, shoot biomass, root biomass and the total biomass of A. philoxeroides between the herbivore-excluded and natural-control treatments in the herbivore exclosure experiment. All of the analyses were performed using SPSS 13.0 (SPSS Inc., Chicago, IL, USA).
